about_the_game:
Heyho, you funky sexy adventure pig!﻿

Pigglet would do anything for a free meal. Even entering a restaurant full of sexy monster girls!
Fight, flirt, adventure and puzzle your way into their hearts... and beyond! ;)
A NSFW rpg adventure with a tried-and-tested one-handed control scheme!

Features

  • Explore a big restaurant full of tasty monster girls and saucy situations
  • Fight and eat delicious monsters and their appetizing mistresses
  • Impress everybody with your big, huge, juicy body parts... like your brain
  • Find new weapons, useful items, sexy secrets and tasty food
  • Get in touch with girls that have a special interest in piggies and piggishness ~

Meet the Monster Girls


  • Grrracelyn - the really bad restaurant promoter wolf
  • Ceana - The spooky Wraithress with focus on customer satisfaction
  • Brandy - The lusty (and tipsy) Succubus barmaid
  • Mully & Skully - The two-headed Ogre head waitress(es)
  • Seren aka Gertrudrix Stormfury - The former Tauren barbarian action movie star
  • Jackie - The stoic Samurai only wanting to enjoy a hot shower
  • Chevalle - The streaming Bunny sommelier
  • Rosa... wait, why is Rosa here??
  • Mori - The first of the Cuisine Witches

  • more sexy monster girls are added all the time ~

Story


Pigglet is the happy winner of a free meal at a restaurant called "Mrs. Big Bad Werewolf"... sounds trustworthy! Even the restaurant promoting Werewolf says all new vict... ehm, guests, are welcome! She definitely said guests, right?
Grab your free meal and find out more about this really absolutely very trustworthy restaurant. Don't worry about being an incredibly delicious pig - surely, nothing bad (or big) will happen, right? Right?!
